item.description:
Sunday, June 13th.

Cheryl Thompson Cameron
Basic Flatwater Paddling Class

Would you like to improve your flatwater paddling skills? The RICKA Flatwater Group will be holding a Basic Flatwater Paddling Class on Sunday, June 13th at 1:00. In this 3-hour class, paddlers will learn the basic strokes and maneuvers to control their boats on flatwater. We will also cover basic rescue techniques. The class will take place at Stump Pond in Smithfield RI and will be free for RICKA and ACA members. If you are not an ACA member, there will be a one-time $5 event membership fee.

Class size is limited to 25 paddlers. Attendance is on a first-come, first-serve basis. Please do not reserve a spot unless you are 100% certain that you can attend. If you cancel at the last minute, you will have tied up a spot that someone else could have used.

Registration: http://www.woonsocket...
item.name: Basic Flatwater Paddling Class
